title: IMF report to be debated on 8th April
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Leader of the House, Dinesh Gunawardena says that the IMF report on Sri Lanka will be debated on Friday, 8th April 2022 at the Parliament.
The International Monetary Fund on 26th February, and highlighted a step-by-step plan for Sri Lanka to overcome its economic crisis and regain debt sustainability.
